content:
Yes, Kauai has plenty of outdoor activities to offer besides hiking and water sports. Here are some activities that you may enjoy:

1. ATV Tours - Explore the island's rugged terrain and scenic trails on an ATV tour.

2. Ziplining - Glide through the lush forests of Kauai on a zipline tour.

3. Horseback Riding - Enjoy a leisurely ride through the countryside or along the beach on a guided horseback ride.

4. Helicopter Tours - Take in Kauai's stunning landscapes from above on a helicopter tour.

5. Botanical Gardens - Visit one of Kauai's many botanical gardens, such as the Allerton Garden,  Limahuli Garden and Preserve, or McBryde Garden, to admire the island's diverse plant life.

6. Whale Watching - Take a boat tour to see humpback whales during the winter months when they migrate to Hawaii.

7. Golf - Kauai has several world-class golf courses, including the famous Princeville Golf Course.

There are plenty of outdoor activities to keep you entertained during your visit to Kauai. Be sure to consult with local guides or tour companies to see which activities would best suit your interests and preferences.
